name: NSFileProviderChangeObserver
desc: An observer that receives changes and deletions during enumeration.

items.name: func didDeleteItems(withIdentifiers: [NSFileProviderItemIdentifier])
items.desc: Tells the observer that the specified items have been deleted.

items.name: func didUpdate([NSFileProviderItemProtocol])
items.desc: Tells the observer that the specified items have been updated.

items.name: func finishEnumeratingChanges(upTo: NSFileProviderSyncAnchor, moreComing: Bool)
items.desc: Tells the observer that all of the changes have been enumerated up to the specified sync anchor.

items.name: func finishEnumeratingWithError(Error)
items.desc: Tells the observer that an error occurred during change notification.

items.name: var suggestedBatchSize: Int
items.desc: The batch size that the system recommends.
